/usr/bin/g++ -g CMakeFiles/simple_example.dir/main.cpp.o -o simple_example   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libShapeDescriptor/libShapeDescriptor.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a libShapeDescriptor/fast-lzma2/libfast-lzma2.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
